title: 138 - Bald Bill
description: On Today's show the boys get right into it and have a full Godzilla vs, King Kong conversation to start the episode. Before Bill can sneak out the back he reveals he has decided to go bald at the age of 24. The boys check in with Gumpy's new apartment life and get into the Pod Fod that starts with discussing their favorite alcohols and rolls into Vegas stories. The rest of the Fod includes discussing their favorite movie franchises, The Rock running for president, what's good on Apple Tv, and much more. Don't forget to subscribe to the youtube channel and watch each show, and follow @ThePodPMI on twitter and instagram to send in your submissions to the Pod Fod. We appreciate you listening and we'll see you Wednesday.
